name: Chamber of Darkness
description: Play as a fearsome knight on a journey filled with challenges. Use a variety of abilities and powerups to take down enemies in an abandoned, torn by war castle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: intel core i3-3220U 3.3 GHZ Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: If graphical issues started
